# Tender Announcement

## Project Details

* **Project Title:** Rotary Grass Mower
* **Reference Number:** WS4320966204-Doc4334731116
* **Posting Date:** December 1, 2023
* **Closing Date:** December 20, 2023, 14:00 (UTC-5)

## Contract Details

* **Contract Value:** N/A
* **Expected Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected End Date:** May 30, 2024

## Tender Details

* **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Tender Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Bid Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Agreements and Restrictions

* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Delivery Regions:** British Columbia, Canada

## Contracting Entity

* **Department:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact:** Samantha Phelan (SPAC/PSPC), samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Information

* **Procurement Method**: Tenders will be accepted electronically through Ariba (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18167957?extsite=MTgxNjc5NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* **Buyer Information**: Phelan, Samantha, Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), Public Procurement, RFP, Freddy Beach Humber Drive Sutton SteartOnCrystal Victoria A Sullivan Derbyshire.
* **Please refer to the RFP document for detailed instructions on submitting a tender.**
